Know your skin

About Us

scroll to discover

Brief Overview Us at a glimpse

Over centuries many have tried to define what beauty is, and whilst many have attempted to depict this through art, maths and concepts, this has not been achieved. This is what lead to the inspiration of sk:INSPIRE. We truly believe beauty cannot be governed by strict rules, rather it is as individual as a fingerprint.

Our philosophy is to make small changes to enhance or restore our patients’ natural beauty, through bespoke tailored treatment plans, rather than broad brush strokes. We help to restore skin function, treat skin conditions and help to not only reverse, but to prevent signs of ageing. We strive to provide our patients with a professional experience they will remember from start to the final result.

view services

We help to restore skin function, treat skin conditions and help to not only reverse, but to prevent signs of ageing. We strive to provide our patients with a professional experience they will remember from start to the final result.

Dr Ravi was extremely professional throughout my procedure, explaining exactly what was being done. He made me feel at ease with his laid back approach. He definitely has an eye for perfection. The end results have been amazing. I will definitely tell others looking for similar procedures about him. l.r

the founders the heart & soul

Dr Ravi Brar , Dr. vanisha madhav

Friends, Founders, Skin Entrepreneurs

dr. ravi brar

chief medical officer

Our co-director, Dr Brar, graduated from the prestigious Guys and St Thomas’ Medical School and is a member of the Royal College of General Practitioners. He accomplished a Postgraduate Diploma in Clinical Dermatology from Queen Mary University London, with Distinction. Practising and understanding skin has allowed. Dr Brar to naturally develop into an aesthetic clinician and he epitomises our philosophy that ‘little is more’.

Dr Brar offers anti-wrinkle injections, advanced dermal fillers, minor surgical procedures and clinical dermatology treatments. Each treatment is bespoke, designed and tailored to the patient in the room. He is passionate about his patient-centred ethos to naturally enhance and define, helping his patients to look and feel their best.

He is passionate about his patient-centred ethos to naturally enhance and define, helping his patients to look and feel their best.

Dr. vanisha madhav

chief clinical officer

Dr Madhav, co-director, is a fully GMC registered doctor, as well as an clinical director. She currently works as a GP in Hertfordshire and is a member of the Royal College of General practitioners. She successfully completed a Bachelor of Science degree in Clinical Pharmacology and Medical degree with a distinction in clinical practice, both at the prestigious King’s College University in London.

In addition to caring for her patients in general practice, Dr Vanisha has pursued her passion for well– being and inner confidence for her patients, and now specialises in advanced non surgical aesthetics procedures and skin treatments.

By combining her medical and scientific knowledge with her aesthetic eye, Dr Vanisha is able to create a bespoke treatment plan for your skin concerns. She believes looking and feeling good is paramount, and with her professional and friendly approach, you will be in the safest of hands during your treatment journey.
